data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oJVqnUVz6C0Q7kNvgHMEDnS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBTEwpKBoCTGEipSdRddKdOZ2ebNVKJMSEUw6I2l64deA&oe=66CAF14C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WnqY74Us1xgQ7kNvgETFcXx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCz7dDz94GuoLzTRupJTGc1N8KVi9IAGOOAGnU7nIRf0w&oe=66CB279F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=-v-VPkL4HSgQ7kNvgGm-Qoe&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB48q0K2KzNW195z1qZ7jBZm8NCfH3uLfCtmZvHBWoSwQ&oe=66CB0CF1)
